languages.text: "Скверно, госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Ее Непогрешимость въехала на Футфол {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}на закорках у голода{/d} и сразу начала наводить свои порядки. Сначала было просто худо, а затем началась настоящая резня. Владайм попытался поднять мятеж, да куда там — люди голодали, половина пошла в услужение к Чорда в обмен на пайку. А оставшихся перевешали".

traits.locale_text: "Ее святейшество и раньше тем еще живодером была, но до откровенного террора дело все же не доходило, а сейчас она будто с цепи сорвалась. Ее холуи умудрились даже до Теневых кварталов добраться, порядки свои тут наводят огнем и цепным мечом. Были сначала даже попытки сопротивления, да только задавили их все вот так вот". {n}Октавиана щелкает пальцем и грустно смотрит в сторону Владайма.{/n} "Вот мы тут в "Амасекусе" и сидим тише воды ниже травы, ждем расправы, как гроксы на убой".
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Badly, my {mf|lord|lady}. Her Infallible Ladyship rode into Footfall {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}on the back of the famine{/d} and straight off began running the place her way. Things were just lousy at first, but then there was real carnage. Vladaym tried to start an uprising, but he didn't stand a chance. The people were starving. Half of them enlisted in Chorda's service for a ration pack. The rest were hanged."
languages.original_text: "Скверно, госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Ее Непогрешимость въехала на Футфол {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}на закорках у голода{/d} и сразу начала наводить свои порядки. Сначала было просто худо, а затем началась настоящая резня. Владайм попытался поднять мятеж, да куда там — люди голодали, половина пошла в услужение к Чорда в обмен на пайку. А оставшихся перевешали".

Things were just lousy at first, but then there was real carnage. Vladaym tried to start an uprising, but he didn't stand a chance. The people were starving. Half of them enlisted in Chorda's service for a ration. The rest were hanged."

languages.text: “相当糟糕，大人。那位正义的女士{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}借着这场饥荒{/d}来到了落脚港，开始以她的方式管理这个地方。一开始的情况就很糟糕，后来演变成了真正的大屠杀。弗拉迪姆打算进行起义，但他完全不是库尔达的对手。所有人都在挨饿，一半的人为了能吃到东西，加入了库尔达的军队，另一半的人全被绞死了。”
languages.original_text: "Badly, my {mf|lord|lady}. Her Infallible Ladyship rode into Footfall {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}on the back of the famine{/d} and straight off began running the place her way. Things were just lousy at first, but then there was real carnage. Vladaym tried to start an uprising, but he didn't stand a chance. The people were starving. Half of them enlisted in Chorda's service for a ration pack. The rest were hanged."

traits.locale_text: “相当糟糕，大人。那位正义的女士借着这场饥荒来到了落脚港，开始以她的方式管理这个地方。一开始的情况就很糟糕，后来演变成了真正的大屠杀。弗拉迪姆打算进行起义，但他完全不是库尔达的对手。所有人都在挨饿，一半的人为了能吃到东西，加入了库尔达的军队，剩下的人全被绞死了。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: 「酷いものですよ、陛下。無謬の女帝は{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}飢饉を利用して{/d}フットフォールに突入し、あっという間に乗っ取ったんです。最初から酷い状況でしたが、その後に大虐殺が起こりました。ヴラダイムは反乱を起こそうとしましたが、彼らが勝つ余地はありませんでした。人々は皆、飢えていたんです。半数は配給パックのためチョーダ軍に入隊し、残りは絞首刑になりました」
languages.original_text: "Badly, my {mf|lord|lady}. Her Infallible Ladyship rode into Footfall {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}on the back of the famine{/d} and straight off began running the place her way. Things were just lousy at first, but then there was real carnage. Vladaym tried to start an uprising, but he didn't stand a chance. The people were starving. Half of them enlisted in Chorda's service for a ration pack. The rest were hanged."

traits.locale_text: 「酷いものですよ、陛下。無謬の女帝は{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}飢饉を利用して{/d}フットフォールに突入し、あっという間に乗っ取ったんです。最初から酷い状況でしたが、その後に大虐殺が起こりました。ヴラダイムは反乱を起こそうとしましたが、彼らが勝つ余地はありませんでした。人々は皆、飢えていたんです。半数は配給パックのためチョーダ軍に入隊し、残りは絞首刑になりました」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: «Mal, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Su infalible señoría entró en Paso {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}a lomos de la hambruna{/d} y enseguida empezó a dirigir el lugar a su manera. Al principio fue horrible, pero luego se convirtió en una carnicería. Vladaym intentó iniciar un levantamiento, pero estaba condenado. La gente se moría de hambre. La mitad se alistó al servicio de Chorda por tener algo que llevarse a la boca. El resto fueron ahorcados».
languages.original_text: "Badly, my {mf|lord|lady}. Her Infallible Ladyship rode into Footfall {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}on the back of the famine{/d} and straight off began running the place her way. Things were just lousy at first, but then there was real carnage. Vladaym tried to start an uprising, but he didn't stand a chance. The people were starving. Half of them enlisted in Chorda's service for a ration pack. The rest were hanged."

traits.locale_text: «Mal, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Su infalible señoría entró en Paso a lomos de la hambruna y enseguida empezó a dirigir el lugar a su manera. Al principio fue horrible, pero luego se convirtió en una carnicería. Vladaym intentó iniciar un levantamiento, pero estaba condenado. La gente se moría de hambre. La mitad se alistó al servicio de Chorda por tener algo que llevarse a la boca. El resto fueron ahorcados».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Übel, {mf|Lord|Lady}. Ihre Unfehlbare Ladyschaft ist {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}auf dem Rücken der Hungersnot{/d} in Footfall eingeritten und hat sofort begonnen, nach ihren Regeln zu regieren. Am Anfang war es 'nur' unschön, aber bald gab es echtes Blutvergießen. Vladaym hat versucht, einen Aufstand anzuzetteln, aber er hatte keine Chance. Die Leute waren am Verhungern. Die Hälfte ist für eine Ration in Chordas Dienste eingetreten. Die anderen wurden gehängt."
languages.original_text: "Badly, my {mf|lord|lady}. Her Infallible Ladyship rode into Footfall {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}on the back of the famine{/d} and straight off began running the place her way. Things were just lousy at first, but then there was real carnage. Vladaym tried to start an uprising, but he didn't stand a chance. The people were starving. Half of them enlisted in Chorda's service for a ration pack. The rest were hanged."

traits.locale_text: "Übel, {mf|Lord|Lady}. Ihre Unfehlbare Ladyschaft ist auf dem Rücken der Hungersnot in Footfall eingeritten und hat sofort begonnen, nach ihren Regeln zu regieren. Am Anfang war es 'nur' unschön, aber bald gab es echtes Blutvergießen. Vladaym hat versucht, einen Aufstand anzuzetteln, aber er hatte keine Chance. Die Leute waren am Verhungern. Die Hälfte ist für eine Ration in Chordas Dienste eingetreten. Die anderen wurden gehängt."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: « Mal, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}. Son Infaillible Seigneurie a débarqué à Castel {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}en pleine famine{/d} et a commencé à diriger la station à sa manière. Au début, ses méthodes étaient simplement contraignantes, mais ça a rapidement viré au carnage. Vladaym a bien tenté de pousser la population à la révolte, mais il n'avait aucune chance. Les gens mouraient de faim ; la moitié se sont enrôlés au service de Chorda en échange de rations. Les autres ont été pendus. »
languages.original_text: "Badly, my {mf|lord|lady}. Her Infallible Ladyship rode into Footfall {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}on the back of the famine{/d} and straight off began running the place her way. Things were just lousy at first, but then there was real carnage. Vladaym tried to start an uprising, but he didn't stand a chance. The people were starving. Half of them enlisted in Chorda's service for a ration pack. The rest were hanged."

traits.locale_text: « Mal, {mf|mon seigneur|ma dame}. Son Infaillible Seigneurie a débarqué à Castel en pleine famine et a commencé à diriger la station à sa manière. Au début, ses méthodes étaient simplement contraignantes, mais ça a rapidement viré au carnage. Vladaym a bien tenté de pousser la population à la révolte, mais il n'avait aucune chance. Les gens mouraient de faim ; la moitié se sont enrôlés au service de Chorda en échange de rations. Les autres ont été pendus. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Hiç iyi gitmiyor {mf|lordum|leydim}. Asla Şaşmaz Leydi Hazretleri Binliman'ın başına geçtiğinde {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}kıtlık hüküm sürüyordu{/d}. Fakat kendisi, hiçbir şeye aldırış etmeden şahsi yöntemleriyle bizi idare etti. Başta o kadar sorun çıkmasa da asıl felaket sonra vurdu. Vladaym isyan etmeye kalkıştı ancak hiç şansı yoktu. Millet açlıktan ölüyordu. Her iki kişiden biri tek kumanya karşılığında Chorda'nın buyruğuna girdi. Kalanlar da idam edildi."
languages.original_text: "Badly, my {mf|lord|lady}. Her Infallible Ladyship rode into Footfall {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}on the back of the famine{/d} and straight off began running the place her way. Things were just lousy at first, but then there was real carnage. Vladaym tried to start an uprising, but he didn't stand a chance. The people were starving. Half of them enlisted in Chorda's service for a ration pack. The rest were hanged."

traits.locale_text: "Hiç iyi gitmiyor {mf|lordum|leydim}. Şaşmaz Leydi Hazretleri Binliman'ın başına geçtiğinde {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_FootfallNotAlly}kıtlık hüküm sürüyordu{/d}. Ama kendisi, hiçbir şeye aldırış etmeden şahsi yöntemleriyle idare etti bizi. Başta o kadar sorun çıkmasa da asıl felaket sonra vurdu. Vladaym isyan etmeye kalkıştı ancak hiç şansı yoktu. Millet açlıktan ölüyordu. Her iki kişiden biri tek kumanya karşılığında Chorda'nın buyruğuna girdi. Kalanlar da idam edildi."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04
